title: Malaysian envoy pays farewell call on foreign secretary
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 28 (APP): Malaysian High Commissioner in Pakistan Ikram Mohammad Ibrahim Friday paid a farewell call on Foreign Secretary Sohail Mahmood here.
The foreign secretary lauded the outgoing envoy’s efforts for strengthening Pakistan-Malaysia ties and deepening cooperation in diverse fields.
FS Sohail Mahmood received Malaysian HC @IkramIbrahimMY for farewell call. FS lauded his efforts for strengthening - ties & deepening coop in diverse fields. Appreciated Malaysia’s support on a range of issues including Jammu & Kashmir dispute & FDP with ASEAN.@MalaysiaMFA pic.twitter.com/wDJtzii5dn
— Spokesperson  MoFA (@ForeignOfficePk) May 28, 2021
He also appreciated Malaysia’s support on a range of issues including Jammu and Kashmir dispute and Full Dialogue Partnership (FDP) with the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN).
